boardgame.name: City of Iron
boardgame.description: In City of Iron, 2-4 players compete to build up a small nation in a world of machines, magic, and money. Become the leader of one of four rival nations: the industrious humans, the toad engineers, the scholarly Cresarians, or the clever hogmen. Produce goods like machine parts and bottled demons to gain wealth, or research steam-age technology and recruit mercenaries to control the continent. If you want to establish new cities, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll build schooners or airships to reach faraway lands and flying islands. Your cities have limited capacity, so you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll have to decide what to keep and what to demolish when building advanced structures. The future of a nation is in your hands. Build unbreakable foundations for an empire or disappear into the dusty pages of history._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Build a civilization in a Steampunk setting_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Customize two decks of cards in a unique twist on deck-building_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Choose your path- build a powerful economy or conquer everything in sight_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Includes hundreds of lavishly-illustrated cards, an extra-large board, land boards, coin tokens, and more_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Kickstarter Editions of both City of Iron and its Experts and Engines expansion. The games have been opened, punched, bagged, and labeled, but they remains un-played and in New condition. A close friend ended up buying the game as well, which resulted in my copy collecting dust. At this point my collection has gotten too large for me and I see no reason to keep this game in my collection since I have such easy access to it. That said, I feel it is an amazing game that should not be missed. For $15 additional I will supply enough sleeves for the entire game and expansion. Price is not negotiable since I am selling the game at less than cost + both games are KS edition with extras not at retail. However, I am open to a trade + cash or a straight trade if its a great deal or something I really want. I prefer local cash transactions, so I offer a 10% discount to anyone who is local. All other payments need to be via paypal or Amazon gift card. Buyer pays all shipping fees. I normally ship the cheapest/fastest (regular or priority) way possible via USPS with tracking, but I am willing to ship differently upon request. If you have any questions or want any pictures, please message me!
